entry.title: $2199 // True One Bdrm in Amazing Clinton Hill Location / C S G / No FEE
entry.content:
Please Read Full Post carefully, so there is No Misunderstanding!!

12 Month lease is a Must!!
Good Credit (40x) and Income is a Must!! (680+)
Guarantors Welcomed!!
Pet Friendly
LGBT Friendly

Hey everyone,

We have a Spacious True One Bedroom in Prime Clinton Hill Location.

STUNNING APARTMENT
- Enclosed Kitchen w/ Amazing Cabinet space
- Full size appliances
- Spacious living room / Common area
- Sun Room
- High Ceilings
- Central Heating
- Intercom system
- Fully Tiled Bathroom
- Huge Wall unit with custom storage
- Over size windows ( plenty of natural sun light)
- Bike storage

Awesome Location!
Tons of grocery, shopping, bars and restaurants on your doorstep. Fun and vibrant area.

Steps away from the C Line @ Franklin Ave or a short walk to the A C @ Nostrand Ave Express line ( Easy Commute to and from the City )

ONLY first and security to move in // NO FEE // good credit (680+) and income needed (40x) // guarantors welcome!

For more information or to schedule a showing please contact me Julian, @ Anytime (Contact info in Photos)
